translation: Tohyih kya pae chhe suh ʿẓym ḥạdthh kya chuh?
Suh doh yylhi lukh āsn prvanan hndụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chhkrith.
Th pharr āsn (vuddan) dvunhi mathi rngdar phmbkụ̄ pạtthụ̄.
Pth yymụ̄ sndụ̄ pạtrụ̄ gvbụ̄ gczhn, (yʿny nyky hndụ̄ pạtrụ̄ āsn gvbụ̄)
Suh vathi dl psnd ārams andr.
Th yymụ̄ sndụ̄ pạtrụ̄ lvtụ̄ āsn,
Tmụ̄ snz rvzan jae āshi akh snụ̄ khae.
Th tohyih kya khbr chhe zi suh chyz kya chuh?
Vuhvun nar (yʿny so āshi nh ṣrf akh sny yạcz khae blkh āshi so kvndi hndụ̄ pạtthụ̄ andry dazan).
